item.title: 蓝星钢铁最大股东支持拒绝88亿美元收购要约
item.description: 蓝星钢铁有限公司最大股东澳大利亚超级基金支持该公司拒绝钢铁动力公司与澳大利亚综合企业SGH有限公司提出的132亿澳元（88亿美元）收购要约，称该要约低估了企业价值。【原文：BlueScope Steel Ltd.’s largest shareholder, AustralianSuper, backed the company’s rejection of a A$13.2 billion ($8.8 billion) takeover approach from Steel Dynamics Inc. and Australian conglomerate SGH Ltd., saying it undervalued the business.】

item.title: 国泰航空寻求节省开支，在提高效率的推动下裁减部分岗位
item.description: 知情人士透露，随着香港旗舰航空公司国泰航空有限公司今年准备放缓增长步伐，该公司已要求所有部门寻找节省开支和提高效率的途径，以控制支出。【原文：Cathay Pacific Airways Ltd. has asked all departments to identify savings and efficiencies in an attempt to rein in expenses, as Hong Kong’s flagship carrier prepares for a slower rate of growth this year, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 狂热玩家的财富将因MiniMax AI上市飙升至16亿美元
item.description: 中国初创企业MiniMax集团在生成式人工智能热潮中度过了最初三年，基本处于旁观状态。当竞争对手争相开发本土版ChatGPT克隆产品时，这家上海团队却致力于攻克更艰巨的课题：构建一个能同时处理文本、语音和视频的单一模型。【原文：Chinese startup MiniMax Group Ltd. spent its first three years largely on the sidelines of the generative-AI boom. As rivals chased local ChatGPT clones, the Shanghai-based team tackled a harder problem: building a single model capable of processing text, speech and video.】

item.title: 债券交易员风险重重的一天始于关键美国就业报告
item.description: 债券交易员正严阵以待，迎接这个波动剧烈的周五。关键的美国就业报告以及最高法院可能对特朗普关税政策作出裁决，都可能打破美国国债市场的沉闷局面。【原文：Bond traders are on guard for an especially volatile Friday as a pivotal US jobs report and a potential Supreme Court ruling on President Donald Trump’s tariffs threaten to jolt the Treasuries market out of its doldrums.】

item.title: 据称和记黄埔选择高盛、瑞银为华生集团香港-伦敦上市项目顾问
item.description: 知情人士透露，和记黄埔有限公司已选定高盛集团和瑞银集团，为旗下全球健康美容零售商屈臣氏集团筹备首次公开募股事宜。【原文：CK Hutchison Holdings Ltd. has picked Goldman Sachs Group Inc. and UBS Group AG to work on the planned initial public offering of global health and beauty retailer A.S. Watson Group, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 马斯克旗下xAI季度亏损扩大，计划为Optimus提供动力
item.description: 据内部文件显示，埃隆·马斯克的人工智能初创公司xAI正以惊人速度烧钱，随着其投入资金建设数据中心、招募人才并开发最终将驱动人形机器人的软件，亏损额持续攀升。【原文：Elon Musk’s artificial intelligence startup xAI is burning cash quickly, with losses mounting as it spends to build data centers, recruit talent and develop software that will eventually power humanoid robots, according to internal documents.】

item.title: 上议院报告严厉批评英国财政部对私人信贷风险漠不关心
item.description: 英国上议院一批知名议员批评财政部对私募资本市场繁荣相关风险的"认知有限"，并表示英格兰银行需要加快推进该领域压力测试的计划。【原文：A prominent group of lawmakers from the UK’s House of Lords has criticized the Treasury for its “limited grasp” of risks related to the boom in private capital markets and said that the Bank of England needs to move faster in its plans for stress testing the sector.】

item.title: 美国证交会官员称投资顾问可使用人工智能进行代理投票
item.description: 美国证券交易委员会一名官员表示，投资顾问可利用人工智能辅助代理投票决策。【原文：Investment advisers can use artificial intelligence to help them make proxy voting decisions, a Securities and Exchange Commission official said.】

item.title: 金价持稳，交易员关注美国就业数据以寻找降息线索
item.description: 金价持稳，交易员权衡美元走强及周五将公布的美国经济数据——这些数据将为今年的利率政策定调。【原文：Gold steadied, as traders weighed a stronger dollar and US economic data due Friday that will set the tone for interest-rate policy this year.】

item.title: 美国金融业监管局寻求延长账户冻结期限以打击针对老年人的欺诈行为
item.description: 金融业监管局已提出规则修订方案，旨在打击投资诈骗行为——特别是针对老年人的诈骗——部分措施包括授权经纪自营商延长对可疑交易的延迟处理期限。【原文：The Financial Industry Regulatory Authority has proposed rule changes aimed at combating investment scams — particularly against senior citizens — in part by empowering broker-dealers to extend delays on suspicious transactions.】

item.title: 日本家庭支出在高市早苗刺激计划出台前上升
item.description: 日本家庭11月消费支出有所增长，这对首相高市早苗而言是个积极信号——她于次月主导国会通过了大规模财政刺激计划。【原文：Japanese households boosted spending in November in a positive sign for Prime Minister Sanae Takaichi, who oversaw passage in parliament of a large fiscal stimulus plan in the following month.】

item.title: 油价延续涨势，交易员关注伊朗风险与委内瑞拉局势
item.description: 油价延续涨势，因市场权衡特朗普总统对伊朗的威胁，同时关注美国为控制委内瑞拉出口和能源部门所采取的措施。【原文：Oil extended a gain as the market weighed President Donald Trump’s threat against Iran, while focusing on US measures to exert control over Venezuela’s exports and energy sector.】

item.title: 抵押贷款债券、住房贷款机构股价飙升，特朗普将住房成本纳入政策目标
item.description: 抵押贷款债券价格上涨，住房贷款机构股价走高。此前美国总统特朗普表示，他正指示购买2000亿美元的抵押贷款债券，此举旨在降低住房成本。【原文：Mortgage bonds rose and home-lender stocks rallied after President Donald Trump said he was directing the purchase of $200 billion of the securities in a move to bring down the cost of housing.】

item.title: 哥伦比亚通胀连续第五年超标
item.description: 2025年，哥伦比亚通胀率连续第五年超过央行目标区间的上限，政策制定者正权衡是否需要启动新一轮加息。【原文：Colombian inflation exceeded the upper limit of the central bank’s target range for a fifth straight year in 2025, as policymakers weigh the need for a new round of interest-rate increases.】

item.title: 英特尔首席执行官会见特朗普，后者称赞其增持美国芯片制造商股份
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德·特朗普周四在白宫会见了英特尔公司首席执行官陈立武，双方就该公司新系列处理器的研发进展进行了讨论。此前美国政府已购入这家芯片制造商的部分股份。【原文：President Donald Trump met with Intel Corp. Chief Executive Officer Lip-Bu Tan on Thursday at the White House, where the two men discussed the company’s progress on its new line of processors following the US government’s purchase of shares in the chipmaker.】

item.title: 秘鲁维持基准利率在4.25%，索尔汇率逼近六年高点
item.description: 秘鲁连续第四个月维持借贷成本不变，因经济增长强劲，同时坚挺的货币有助于抑制该国通胀率——其通胀水平在发展中市场中已属最低之列。【原文：Peru held borrowing costs for a fourth straight month as the economy grows briskly while the strong currency helps keep a lid on one of the lowest levels of inflation in emerging markets.】

item.title: 人工智能公司MiniMax完成6.19亿美元IPO后将登陆香港市场
item.description: 中国最大生成式人工智能初创企业之一MiniMax集团已完成首次公开募股，筹集资金6.19亿美元，即将登陆香港股市。【原文：MiniMax Group Inc., one of China’s largest generative AI startups, is set to begin trading in Hong Kong after an initial public offering that raised $619 million.】

item.title: New Zealand Labor Pool Grows at Fastest Pace in Two Years
item.description: New Zealand’s working-age population grew at the fastest pace in two years in the fourth quarter as an economic recovery encouraged foreign job seekers.

item.title: Asian Stocks to Rise Before Payrolls, Oil Jumps: Markets Wrap
item.description: 亚洲股市料将高开，此前华尔街股市涨跌不一，且市场正等待周五公布的美国就业数据以及最高法院可能对特朗普关税政策作出的裁决。油价大幅上涨。【原文：Asian equities look set to open higher after a mixed session on Wall Street and ahead of US payroll data due Friday and a possible Supreme Court ruling on President Donald Trump’s tariffs. Oil jumped.】

item.title: Apple CEO’s Compensation Holds Steady at About $74 Million
item.description: 苹果公司首席执行官蒂姆·库克在2025年的薪酬保持稳定，约为7400万美元，其中大部分以股票奖励形式发放。【原文：The compensation of Apple Inc. Chief Executive Officer Tim Cook held steady at about $74 million in 2025, with most of the package coming in the form of stock awards.】

item.title: Bank of Canada Sees Senior Departures As Carney Pushes Budget Cuts
item.description: 加拿大银行两名资深董事即将退休，此举正值总理马克·卡尼推动缩减公共服务规模之际。【原文：Two longtime directors at the Bank of Canada are retiring as Prime Minister Mark Carney pushes to shrink the public service.】

item.title: 稳定币交易量飙升至创纪录的33万亿美元，USDC领跑市场
item.description: 去年，在亲加密货币的特朗普总统领导下，美国实施的有利政策推动了稳定币交易量达到前所未有的高度。【原文：Stablecoin transactions reached unprecedented heights last year, buoyed by favorable policy in the US under pro-crypto President Donald Trump.】

item.title: 抵押贷款债券上涨，特朗普要求购买2000亿美元债券
item.description: 抵押贷款支持证券周四相对于美国国债出现反弹，此前美国总统唐纳德·特朗普表示正指示购买2000亿美元抵押贷款债券。【原文：Mortgage backed securities rallied relative to Treasuries on Thursday after US President Donald Trump said he was directing the purchase of $200 billion of mortgage bonds.】

item.title: 理查德·伯恩斯坦顾问公司称市场泡沫远不止于人工智能领域
item.description: Excess liquidity has inflated asset prices across markets beyond just artificial intelligence, according to Richard Bernstein Advisors.

item.title: Creators Say Spotify Pays Up to Twice as Much as YouTube for Video Podcasts
item.description: The Swedish streaming giant is stepping up its courtship of YouTubers as it pushes deeper into video

item.title: Dollar Defies Trump Turmoil, Rising With Focus on the Fed’s Path
item.description: 在美元问题上，美国经济的意外韧性正压倒特朗普总统引发的地缘政治动荡。【原文：When it comes to the dollar, the surprising resilience of the US economy is overpowering the geopolitical turmoil unleashed by President Donald Trump.】

item.title: KKR通过最新收购案将实现OneStream4.5倍回报率
item.description: KKR & Co.对金融软件制造商OneStream Inc.的投资回报已增长逾四倍。【原文：KKR & Co. has more than quadrupled its money in a bet on financial software maker OneStream Inc.】

item.title: 阿根廷建筑业创下2025年最大月度跌幅
item.description: 阿根廷建筑业在关键中期选举后创下去年最大月度跌幅，该国制造业活动也出现放缓。【原文：Argentina’s construction sector posted its largest monthly decline of last year after crucial midterm elections, while the country’s manufacturing industry also saw activity slow.】

item.title: 葡萄牙的森特诺宣布将竞选欧洲央行副行长职位
item.description: 葡萄牙前央行行长马里奥·森特诺表示，他将竞选欧洲央行副行长一职。【原文：Portugal’s former central-bank Governor Mario Centeno said he is running for the role of European Central Bank vice president.】

item.title: 据称英伟达支持的Nscale正寻求20亿美元融资
item.description: Data center company Nscale is in talks with investors to raise about $2 billion, according to people familiar with the matter, a little over three months after closing its last funding round.
